title: Warm Jackets for Rangpur
description: Help us distribute warm jackets to vulnerable families in Rangpur during the winter season.

title: Blankets for Sylhet Villages
description: Join our efforts to provide blankets to people in remote villages of Sylhet to stay warm.

title: Sweaters for Children in Dhaka
description: We aim to collect sweaters for underprivileged children in Dhaka to help them fight the cold.

title: Winter Aid for Chattogram Hills
description: Support communities in the Chattogram Hill Tracts with winter clothing and essentials.

title: Warm Clothes for Barishal Fishermen
description: Provide warm clothes to fishermen and their families in Barishal to withstand cold mornings.

title: Woolen Scarves for Mymensingh
description: Distribute woolen scarves to protect the elderly in Mymensingh from chilly winds.

title: Clothing for Homeless in Khulna
description: Donate clothes to homeless people in Khulna to shield them from the winter chill.

title: Cozy Beanies for Rajshahi Farmers
description: Support Rajshahi farmers with cozy beanies to keep them warm during early morning farming.

title: Thermal Wear for Gazipur Workers
description: Distribute thermal wear to factory workers in Gazipur to help them combat freezing conditions.

title: Winter Relief for Rural Comilla
description: Provide winter relief items to rural communities in Comilla to ensure their safety and warmth.
